text:
[Verse]
Raindrops fallin' from the sky
Little tears from way up high
Splashin' down on my face
Oh try
To keep the sunshine in my mind

[Verse 2]
Clouds are gatherin' all around
But I won't let my smile down
Dancin' in puddles on the ground
Feelin' the love
Hear the sound

[Chorus]
Raindrops and sunshine
Hand in hand they shine
In my heart they're mine
Keep me feelin' fine

[Verse 3]
Stormy weather come and go
In my eyes a magic glow
Laughin' through the winds that blow
Holdin' tight
Won't let it go

[Bridge]
Splash and sparkle
Life untamed
In this dance we can't be blamed
Joy and sorrow
Both are famed
Singin' loud
Never ashamed

[Verse 4]
Rainbow arcs across the sky
All the colors make me sigh
From the rain to bright blue sky
Feels like love
It makes me high
title: Raindrops and Sunshine
